Method Detail

loadSpaceWorlds

public void loadSpaceWorlds()
Loads the space worlds into spaceWorlds and creates them if Multiverse is not there.

getStartupLoaded

public boolean getStartupLoaded()
Checks if any worlds were created/loaded on plugin startup.

Returns:
true if any spaceworld was loaded from the config

getUsingMV

public boolean getUsingMV()
Checks if MultiVerse is being used for world generation.

Returns:
true if MultiVerse is used

createSpaceWorld

public void createSpaceWorld(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                             String worldname,
                             boolean log)
Creates a spaceworld with the default settings and the given name. I suggest you to do the if worldname exists-check yourself aswell, if you do not want BananaSpace to nag about it.. I suggest you also turn logging on so users know an error was your fault, not mine.

Parameters:
plugin - Your plugin
worldname - Name for new spaceworld
log - True if the console should be informed that an external plugin created a spaceworld.

removeSpaceWorld

public void removeSpaceWorld(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                             String worldname,
                             boolean log)
Removes a spaceworld with the default settings and the given name. I suggest you to do the if worldname exists-check yourself aswell, if you do not want BananaSpace to nag about it.. I suggest you also turn logging on so users know an error was your fault, not mine.

Parameters:
plugin - Your plugin
worldname - Name of spaceworld
log - True if the console should be informed that an external plugin removed a spaceworld.

startForceNightTask

public void startForceNightTask(org.bukkit.World world)
Starts the force night task if required.

Parameters:
world - World

stopForceNightTask

public void stopForceNightTask(org.bukkit.World world)
Stops the force night task. No safety checks made, explosions may occur.

Parameters:
world - World

getSpaceWorlds

public List<org.bukkit.World> getSpaceWorlds()
Gives all the space worlds of the server.

all space worlds as a List
